EmailTemplate.description: Email template for training member registration
EmailTemplate.name: II FFN Training Registration Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Imagine Institute Training Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're invited to register!
Hello ,
{!Campaign.Name}
We would like to invite you to an upcoming training session. Please visit our website to register.
http://test501wp.azurewebsites.net/training-registration/
Remember: In order to receive your bonus, you must be authorized and providing care to a subsidized child in the month the training takes place. No food or child care is provided at this training. Only registered participants will be allowed entry.
Please let us know if you have any questions.
Call us at 206-492-5249 or email training@imaginewa.org.
See you soon!
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
